author: danderson
msg: Backport the fix for issue #2388 for the 1.2.x line.  The issue was
that users with no write access whatsoever to a repository could
commit empty revisions and/or leave active transactions lying
around. The issue was fixed in r16048 in trunk.
(check_access): Do a global access lookup if there is no repos_path,
instead of systematically returning access granted.
